CortexPrime.Label: Label
CortexPrime.MaxDiceD: The most amount of dice assigned to a trait in this trait set. If set to -1, there is no maximum.
CortexPrime.MaxDieRatingD: The largest any die can be set to a trait in this trait set.
CortexPrime.MinDiceD: The least amount of dice assigned to a trait in this trait set. The highest this will accept is 10, to prevent accidental large numbers.
CortexPrime.MinDieRatingD: The smallest any die can be set to a trait in this trait set. A zero means it can have no dice.
CortexPrime.NoTraitsInPool: There are currently no traits or dice in this pool.
CortexPrime.OrderD: The order it will appear in the character sheet. Ties will be sorted alphabetically
